post.summary: Informational. Registers. Compensation once a day

public_key.description: Public key - the store identifier. You can get the key in the [store settings](https://www.liqpay.ua/en/adminbusiness)

date.description: If parameter is unknown `compensation_id`, then date by which you need to get a list `compensation_id`

action.description:
Transaction type. Possible values:
* `pay` - payment
* `hold` - amount of hold on sender's account
* `paysplit` - splitting payments
* `subscribe` - creation of a regular payment
* `paydonate` - donation
* `auth` - card preauth
* `regular` - regular payment

authcode_debit.description: Authorization code for transaction of debit

customer.description: Unique customer ID in your shop

paytype.description:
Methods of payment. Possible values:
* `card` - card payment
* `privat24` - with privat24 account
* `masterpass` - with masterpass account
* `moment_part` - installments
* `cash` - cash
* `invoice` - to email
* `qr` - qr code scanning

trans_bonus.description: The amount of the bonus for the transaction

trans_fee_credit.description: The amount of the loan transaction commission

trans_fee_debit.description: The amount of the debit transaction commission

trans_total.description: The amount of reimbursement of the company

public_key.description: Public key - the store identifier. You can get the key in the [store settings](https://www.liqpay.ua/en/adminbusiness)

date.description: Date for which the registry will be uploaded

Transaction type. Possible values:

post.summary: Informational. Registers. Getting the compensation registry

public_key.description: Public key - the store identifier. You can get the key in the [store settings](https://www.liqpay.ua/en/adminbusiness)

date.description: If the `compensation_id` parameter is unknown, the payment date for which you want to receive the registry is being passed

register_token.description: Parameter received on the previous request

post.summary: Informational. Registers. Getting the compensation registry status

public_key.description: Public key - the store identifier. You can get the key in the [store settings](https://www.liqpay.ua/en/adminbusiness)

register_token.description: Parameter received on the previous request

status.description:
The status of a request. Possible values:
* `processing` - on processing, the file is being formed
* `error` - an error occurred during download, we recommend checking the request data and repeat (in case of repeated error, contact LiqPay support)
* `success` - successful request

post.summary: Informational. Registers. Registry by p2p operation

public_key.description: Public key - the store identifier. You can get the key in the [store settings](https://www.liqpay.ua/en/adminbusiness)

date.description: Date for which the registry will be uploaded

type.description:
Type of operation. Possible values:
* `p2p` - for operations of type p2pdebit
* `p2pcredit` - for operations of type p2pcredit (default "acquiring")

register_token.description: Parameter received on the previous request

post.summary: Informational. Registers. p2p operation registry status

public_key.description: Public key - the store identifier. You can get the key in the [store settings](https://www.liqpay.ua/en/adminbusiness)

register_token.description: Parameter received on the previous request

status.description:
The status of a request. Possible values:
* `processing` - on processing, the file is being formed
* `error` - an error occurred during download, we recommend checking the request data and repeat (in case of repeated error, contact LiqPay support)
* `success` - successful request
